abstract: Sun Microsystems is being sued by shareholders seeking to block its $7.4 billion deal to be acquired by Oracle, the company revealed in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission Friday.
lead_paragraph: Sun Microsystems is being sued by shareholders seeking to block its $7.4 billion deal to be acquired by Oracle, the company revealed in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission Friday.

headline.main: Sun Shareholders Sue to Block Oracle Deal
